item.title: [ 95] /lmg/ - Local Models General
item.description:
/lmg/ - a general dedicated to the discussion and development of local language models.

Previous threads: >>105007451 & >>105000931

►News
>(04/09) Kimi-VL: 16B-A3B reasoning VLM released: https://github.com/MoonshotAI/Kimi-VL
>(04/08) DeepCoder-14B-Preview, code reasoning model finetuned from Deepseek-R1-Distilled-Qwen-14B via distributed RL: https://together.ai/blog/deepcoder
>(04/08) Cogito v1 Preview released: https://deepcogito.com/research/cogito-v1-preview
>(04/08) Llama-3.1-Nemotron-Ultra-253B-v1 released: https://hf.co/nvidia/Llama-3_1-Nemotron-Ultra-253B-v1

►News Archive: https://rentry.org/lmg-news-archive
►Glossary: https://rentry.org/lmg-glossary

Sampler Visualizer: https://artefact2.github.io/llm-sampling

https://github.com/LostRuins/koboldcpp

item.title: [235] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 175: power of frenshipEdition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg

Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)

item.title: [ 88] Trump announces 90-day pause on ‘reciprocal’ tariffs with exception of China
item.description:
https://www.cnn.com/2025/04/09/business/reciprocal-tariff-pause-trump/index.html
President Donald Trump announced a complete pause on all the “reciprocal” tariffs that went into effect at midnight, with the exception of China.

Tariffs on China will be increased to 125% from 104%, he said.

Trump in a Truth Social post Wednesday said he has “authorized a 90 day PAUSE, and a substantially lowered Reciprocal Tariff during this period, of 10%, also effective immediately.”

“Based on the lack of respect that China has shown to the World’s Markets, I am hereby raising the Tariff charged to China by the United States of America to 125%, effective immediately,” Trump said in his social media post. “At some point, hopefully in the near future, China will realize that the days of ripping off the U.S.A., and other Countries, is no longer sustainable or acceptable,” he wrote.

Stocks rocketed higher on the news, with the Dow surging 2,200 points, or 5.9%. The S&P 500 rose 6.5% and the Nasdaq was more than 8% higher.

Trump, however, did not indicate he was pausing the 10% universal tariff on all trading partners, with the exception of Canada and Mexico, that went into effect over the weekend. Therefore, countries that were subjects of reciprocal tariffs will continue to have a 10% tariff levied on them.

Original filename: 1743562230347138.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [109] White House Confirms Trump Is Exploring Ways To ‘Deport’ U.S. Citizens
item.description:
https://www.huffpost.com/entry/white-house-confirms-trump-is-exploring-ways-to-deport-us-citizens_n_67f580abe4b0a5ea5c7608d2

White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said Tuesday that President Donald Trump is exploring legal pathways to “deport” U.S. citizens to El Salvador, where the administration has already arranged to house deported immigrants in a prison known for its human rights abuses. (Watch the video, above.)

Leavitt suggested the effort would be limited to people who have committed major crimes, but Trump has also mentioned the possibility of sending people who commit lesser offenses abroad.

Any such move on the part of the Trump administration is certain to be challenged in court. It is also not clear what legal authority could be used to justify expelling U.S. citizens from their homeland.

“These would be heinous, violent criminals who have broken our nation’s laws repeatedly. These are violent, repeat offenders on American streets,” Leavitt told reporters at a press briefing.

“The president has said if it’s legal, right, if there is a legal pathway to do that. He’s not sure, [and] we are not sure if there is,” Leavitt continued. “It’s an idea that he has simply floated and has discussed very publicly in the effort of transparency.”

Original filename: 1740778791723484.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 39] Texan scientists un-extinct the dire wolf species
item.description:
While California is bickering about fringe minority issues, the Great Men in Texas just un-extincted an entire species. Un-extincted is expected to be added to dictionaries everywhere after this pivotal achievement
They used the DNA found in a species known as Dire Wolf that went extinct 10,000 years ago, and made 20 precise edits to it using DNA from its closing living relative, and then grew them in a surrogate mother.
They were born October 1 2024 and are currently alive and healthy.
https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/meet-dire-wolf-trio-remus-romulus-khaleesi-how-texas-lab-revived-extinct-species-1732511
Meet The Dire Wolf Trio Remus, Romulus And Khaleesi: How A Texas Lab Revived An Extinct Species

It was once thought to be a creature of fantasy, made famous by Game of Thrones, but now the legendary dire wolf has returned—sort of. Scientists at Texas-based biotech company Colossal Biosciences claim to have successfully revived the extinct predator through cutting-edge gene editing, producing three live wolf pups that carry dire wolf DNA for the first time in over 12,000 years.

The landmark achievement marks the world's first successful instance of de-extinction, according to The New York Times. Although the animals are not exact replicas of the ancient species, they carry 20 key dire wolf genes, including those influencing size, coat colour, and build.

Two males named Romulus and Remus were born in October 2024, and three months later, a female named Khaleesi. All three now live in a secure, 2,000-acre preserve somewhere in the northern United States. The wolves are already showing telltale traits: white, dense fur, large bodies, bushy tails and thick manes. According to Colossal's chief scientific officer, Beth Shapiro, the animals represent the closest humans have come to bringing an extinct species back to life.

Original filename: 🐺 Romulus & Remus 🐺.png

item.title: [159] /out/ings with a pipe
item.description:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

Original filename: 0687fd190525af3678814c5f459c2d0a.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
